text:
We were running 2.0.46 on gentoo with some SSI pages scattered about.  After the
latest emerge to 2.0.47 only index.shtml would work.  After some scampering
around we removed the + from the "Options +Includes" in apache2.conf and
everything started working right.  This is the only server we run SSI on so I
don't know if its gentoo related or apache related.  Assuming this was an
intentional change then the documentation just needs to be updated.

Thanks!

Kevin White
creator: nastygnat@hotmail.com

text: This sounds like a problem with Gentoo's packaging.
creator: thom@planetarytramp.net

text:
Just a quick note in addition to Thom. I'm using gentoo myself and therefore
just downloaded the package to have a look at it. The config contains a lot of
weird +/- options, e.g.

Options -All -Multiviews
or
Options -Indexes FollowSymlinks

It's very likely that this configuration stategy breaks something at some point.
(side note: 2.0.47 changed the manual configuration, that needs to be adjusted
in the package files as well ...)

HTH, nd
creator: nd@perlig.de
